page.title: 06 Moy People
page.content: 82 people live in Moy study block. There is no shop, no Post Office, no chemist, in fact very few facilities. At their disposal the inhabitants have 1 telephone box, 1 post box and 2 bus shelters. There is a Church of Scotland. The Minister lives in the Manse of a neighbouring community. 15 children attend the local Primary School situated 1 mile from the village and outwith the study block. Secondary pupils bus to Millburn Academy, Inverness. There are several pre_school children in the area. The community consists of people who have lived in Moy all their lives together with an influx of people moving into the area. 82 PEOPLE AGED 8 MONTHS _ 80 YEARS 49 ADULTS 33 CHILDREN (22 boys 11 girls)
